document.full_text: a $30 million slander lawsuit against the u.s. anti-doping agency, filed by the former coach of disgraced sprinters marion jones, justin gatlin and tim montgomery, has been dismissed.
document.title: court drops coach's slander lawsuit against usada
lines_and_colors: a $30 million slander lawsuit against the u.s. anti-doping agency, filed by the former coach of disgraced sprinters marion jones, justin gatlin and tim montgomery, has been dismissed.
